summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Journeyman dating app new features. All 45 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI tests confirmed all new features working: Login/Signup flows, GIF picker (GIPHY integration), Emoji picker, Social links editor, Settings page with notification toggles, Notification dropdown, Map view, Chat page with message reactions, and Hot Travelers feature.

ui_bugs.issue: Send message button click intercepted by 'Made with Emergent' badge at bottom of page
ui_bugs.workaround: User can press Enter to send message or scroll up slightly

passed_tests: Backend: GIF search endpoint (/api/gifs/search) - GIPHY integration working
Backend: GIF trending endpoint (/api/gifs/trending) - returns trending GIFs
Backend: Social links update (/api/profile/social-links PUT) - saves Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, Snapchat
Backend: Social links get (/api/profile/{user_id}/social-links) - retrieves saved links
Backend: Notification settings GET (/api/settings/notifications) - returns default settings
Backend: Notification settings PUT (/api/settings/notifications) - updates settings
Backend: Message reactions (/api/messages/{id}/reaction) - adds emoji reactions
Backend: Invalid emoji rejection - correctly rejects non-whitelisted emojis
Backend: Media upload validation (/api/media/upload) - validates file requirement
Backend: All 23 core API tests (auth, profile, discovery, schedules, notifications)
Backend: All 10 Hot Travelers tests
Frontend: Login flow with JWT authentication - working
Frontend: Signup/registration flow - working
Frontend: Discover page with swipe cards - working
Frontend: Hot Travelers banner and badge - showing correctly
Frontend: Profile page with social links editor - modal opens and saves
Frontend: Chat page - GIF picker opens with search and trending
Frontend: Chat page - Emoji picker opens with categories
Frontend: Chat page - Message input and toolbar buttons present
Frontend: Settings page - notification toggles working
Frontend: Notification dropdown - shows notifications with mark all read
Frontend: Map view on discover page - Leaflet map renders
Frontend: Bottom navigation between all pages - working
Frontend: Schedules page - shows empty state with Add Trip button
critical_code_review_comments: GIPHY integration uses free public beta key - working correctly
Media upload endpoint exists but requires AWS S3 credentials (MOCKED - will fail without S3 config)
Social links editor properly saves to database via /api/profile/social-links
Message reactions limited to whitelisted emojis for safety
All new UI components have proper data-testid attributes for testing
seed_data_creation: Created match between testuser@example.com and chattest_user2@example.com for chat testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features tested and working: GIF picker (GIPHY), Emoji picker, Social links editor, Settings page, Notification dropdown, Map view, Chat with reactions. Media upload endpoint is MOCKED - requires AWS S3 credentials to work. The 'Made with Emergent' badge at bottom of page can intercept clicks on elements near the bottom - this is a minor UI issue.

mocked_apis.media_upload: /api/media/upload - requires AWS S3 credentials not configured, will fail on actual file upload
